title.newValue: Microsoft Viva: Add learning to calendar on Viva Learning mobile app

description.oldValue:
Add to Calendar feature will help the learners block learning time in their calendar to take up any course at their preferred time.
GA date: June CY2023
description.newValue:
Add to Calendar mobile feature will help learners on the Viva Learning mobile app add learning content to their calendars and block focused time for learning.
GA date: June CY2023
